titleInfo.title: USA v. Coffman
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER regarding 18 Appeal from Magistrate Judge Order as to Brandon Gerome Coffman (1). I have reviewed the appeal from Magistrate's order denying review of detention (filing 18). Whether I review the Magistrate Judges decision de novo or otherwise, it is apparent that Magistrate Judge Piester's decision was correct. Therefore, IT IS ORDERED that the appeal (filing 18) is denied. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. ( LKH, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER regarding 18 Appeal from Magistrate Judge Order as to Brandon Gerome Coffman (1). I have reviewed the appeal from Magistrate's order denying review of detention (filing 18). Whether I review the Magistrate Judges decision de novo or otherwise, it is apparent that Magistrate Judge Piester's decision was correct. Therefore, IT IS ORDERED that the appeal (filing 18) is denied. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. ( LKH, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Coffman
titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Revised Presentence Investigation Report and Addendum, as to defendant Brandon Gerome Coffman. It is ordered that: (2)The defendant's objection and departure motion 34 will be resolved at sentencing.(3)Except to the extent (if at all) that I have sustained an objection or granted a motion or reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. ETC. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Coffman
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to defendant Brandon Gerome Coffman (1). DEFENDANT pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 235 months; 5 years supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 special assessment. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (4 Certified copies to USM)(LKH)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to defendant Brandon Gerome Coffman (1). titleInfo.title: USA v. Coffman
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to Brandon Gerome Coffman. It is ordered that: (1)Counsel for the government shall notify the court when the motion for reduction in sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 44 is ripe for decision. The motion shall not be decided until counsel for the government certifies that the motion is ripe;(2)Counsel for the defendant, if previously appointed pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, is reappointed to represent the defendant for purposes of the Rule 35(b) motion. If retained, counsel for the defendant remains as counsel for the defendant until the Rule 35(b) motion is resolved or until given leave to withdraw;(3)The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher;(4)The Clerk of the Court shall provide a copy of this order to counsel for the government and counsel for the defendant. The undersigned's judicial assistant will provide a copy to the Federal Public Defender. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. ( KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to Brandon Gerome Coffman. It is ordered that: (1)Counsel for the government shall notify the court when the motion for reduction in sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 44 is ripe for decision. The motion shall not be decided until counsel for the government certifies that the motion is ripe;(2)Counsel for the defendant, if previously appointed pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, is reappointed to represent the defendant for purposes of the Rule 35(b) motion. If retained, counsel for the defendant remains as counsel for the defendant until the Rule 35(b) motion is resolved or until given leave to withdraw;(3)The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher;(4)The Clerk of the Court shall provide a copy of this order to counsel for the government and counsel for the defendant. The undersigned's judicial assistant will provide a copy to the Federal Public Defender. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. ( KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Coffman
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Brandon Gerome Coffman. It is ordered that: (1)The government's request for hearing 46 is granted.(2)A hearing on the government's motion for reduction of sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 44 has been set before the undersigned United States district judge on Wednesday, December 15, 2010, at 1:00 p.m., in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska.(3)The United States Marshal is directed to return the defendant to the district for the hearing. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to defendant Brandon Gerome Coffman. titleInfo.title: USA v. Coffman
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER - Defendant's Motion for Leave to Appeal In Forma Pauperis (filing 57) is granted. Defendant may proceed on appeal without prepayment of fees or costs. The Clerk of the United States District Court for the District of Nebraska shall process Defendant's appeal as to defendant Brandon Gerome Coffman. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (AOA)
